===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A blackish-brown pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to "replenish blood and remove blood stasis, or to regulate menstruation when there is [[qi]] and blood stagnation, menoxenia, dysmenorrhea, or abdominal mass". Honey is used as the binding agent.

Desheng pills pills contain the following ingredients:
